reviews.comment: Does not work. In the woods I have a 3G network prepaid and it does not allow me to get the 3G logo at all. This app is a failure that\'s why its free.
reviews.author: TalreauAir com

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Thanx for dis app. It is helpful for d 3g connection or internet connection..b4 my 3g was interrupt..when i using dis app.my 3g was visible.and it is amazing..  Great job... thanx to did dis app. Love u.. :) LOl
reviews.author: feliciano bautista jr

reviews.comment: I love it!  Connection on my HTC evo is so much better than before.  I actually stay connected for longer than 2 minutes yay!
reviews.author: K Kessler

reviews.title: great apps
reviews.comment: Able to detect 3g network for those uncover area like underground or rural area once activate the apps.
reviews.author: Lim Malcolm

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: From zero to hero :-) plenty of 3g to spare.  Highly recommend app.
reviews.author: Rigo Valdez

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Its loaded with adds dont bother, I love these apps that ask for a rating before you even try it. Now I have to uninstal and hopefully clean the adds and cache off of my phone
reviews.author: Adam Hackborn

reviews.title: Ok app.
reviews.comment: It works pretty good based off all the others ive tried.
reviews.author: Greg Clark

reviews.comment: it is the best booster that\'s out there that I can find for my phone. so why not give it a try it is great it helps and it works good. thank you for making this app where it\'s free and making my signal very good thanks to all the people who have created this app.\tit is a very good program and prairie and it works really well thank you and I would use it if I was you
reviews.author: Jason Jeffers

reviews.comment: Excellent app! It actually works.. I could never yet wifi above 2 bars and now it\'s getting three bars
reviews.author: jared wheeler

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: So far so good, upgrade time
reviews.author: Harry Whitecross

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: This app didnt increase my internet speed or connection the only thing the app is good for is a ton of random pop-ups. 2 thumbs way down
reviews.author: Bryson Goins

reviews.comment: Good app to install. Especially if you live in a house that blocks your wifi signal, which is a whole other problem of its own.\tDown load this app if you have a weak wifi signal , of course if you\'d rather deal with a weak signal and dropped apps don\'t install it, and good luck when you loose an app or it freezes up on you.
reviews.author: Richard Beck

reviews.title: Gooood
reviews.comment: I have tried so much fake but for me this works very good brilent and excellent for my Galaxy SIII
reviews.author: Mohammed Munir

reviews.title: PACKES WITH ADVERTISING MALWARE
reviews.comment: PACKED TO THE BRIM WITH MALWARE TO GET DEVS AD REVENUE. RUNS IN BG WITHOUT PROGRAM. ALSO CAUSES TETHERING TO DC EVERY 5 MINUTES. **DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS IT CONTAINS MALWARE **
reviews.author: Timothy R. Wilson

reviews.title: Nothing but ads and crap.
reviews.comment: Within seconds of installing this app I was being bombarded with ads including some appearing in the phones drop down menu saying I was being opted into premium rate text services. Only way to stop them was to sever all data connections and uninstall the app. DO NOT INSTALL!
reviews.author: Jeremy Kearney

reviews.title: waste of time
reviews.comment: It\'s a fake app, having nothing to do with network boosting. I have full access to 3g near my window, I thought this app might improve the signal so that I could get 3g signal away from my window in my room, but this app really sucks and it proved to be good for nothing
reviews.author: abhishek sinha

reviews.title: Don\'t download, pop up ads!
reviews.comment: The idea is good but it lack\'s ease of use,  the ads keep popping up and get in the way.  I wouldn\'t pay the money as its a poor interface.
reviews.author: Alex Roberts

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: This app does indeed work, it has helped me with using internet. Thank you Halo Electronics.
reviews.author: Joseph Trujillo

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t do anything. Design awkward and not user-friendly. Unclear as to where to make Internet speed faster. Too many ads, e.g before being able to open, in app, Airpush etc. Don\'t get it, it\'s useless.
reviews.author: Philip Edwards
